text:
In view of the rising #COVID19 cases in India, we appeal to everyone of you to please:
1. Stay Home
2. Wear a mask when going out
3. Maintain social distance
4. Get a #Vaccine
5. Help generously

Let us avoid a #Lockdown

Together we will win.

#SecondCOVIDWave
